attributes.action: Maintain rights of UK citizens to be EU citizens if UK ceases as a member of EU
attributes.additional_details:
Article 9 of the Treaty on European Union.
Article 20 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union.
Dual Citizenship is permitted under UK Law
attributes.background: European Treaties caused UK citizens to become EU citizens but do not address the UK leaving the EU. Citizenship is an individual right and it would be a betrayal of fundamental human rights to cancel EU citizenship without consent, although UK citizens should be able to relinquish EU citizenship.
